---
format:
  html:
    output-file: index.html
    theme: default
    toc: false
    page-layout: full
    css: |
      body {
        max-width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      .quarto-container {
        max-width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      .family-tree {
        max-width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        margin: 1em 0;
        border: 1px solid #ddd;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        border-radius: 8px;
        padding: 0.5em;
        background-color: #fafafa;
      }

      .family-tree svg {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        display: block;
        margin: 0 auto;
        min-height: 600px;
      }

      .family-tree img {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        display: block;
        margin: 0 auto;
        min-height: 600px;
      }

      /* Interactive hover effects only for tree connections */
      .tree-connection {
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      .tree-connection:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3));
      }

      .tree-connection:hover path {
        stroke-width: 3 !important;
      }

      .tree-connection:hover text {
        font-weight: bold;
        font-size: 11px;
      }

      .tree-description {
        margin-top: 1em;
        padding: 1em;
        background-color: #f8f9fa;
        border-left: 4px solid #007bff;
        font-style: italic;
      }

      h1, h2, h3 {
        color: #333;
        border-bottom: 2px solid #007bff;
        padding-bottom: 0.5em;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 1em 0;
      }

      /* Ensure footer scrolls with page */
      footer, .footer {
        position: static !important;
        margin-top: 2em;
        padding: 1em;
      }

      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .family-tree {
          margin: 0.5em 0;
          padding: 0.3em;
        }

        .family-tree svg,
        .family-tree img {
          min-height: 400px;
        }
      }
---

This webpage was created by <a href="https://lchogal.github.io/cv/">Leslie Hodges Gallagher</a>, granddaughter of Marjorie Inez Smith (1920-1996). Research relied on crowd-sourced information from Geni.com, FamilySearch.org, and FindAGrave.com. The current tree, published November 2024, should be considered a working draft while primary historical sources are verified. Supporting files can be found in the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/lchogal/Smith_line).
